name: deployment-assistant
description: Automates deployment processes using GitHub Copilot

deploymentAssistant.sshCommand.description: SSH command to connect to the remote server

deploymentAssistant.scriptMetadataFileNa.description: Filename for the script metadata CSV file

deploymentAssistant.readCsvInstructionsF.description: Filename for the CSV reading instructions

deploymentAssistant.cleansingInstruction.description: Filename for the SQL cleansing instructions

deploymentAssistant.rawDdlScriptsDirecto.description: Directory name for raw DDL scripts

deploymentAssistant.scriptedFilesDirecto.description: Directory name for processed script files

deploymentAssistant.generatedScriptFileN.description: Filename for the generated shell script

deploymentAssistant.batchSize.description: Number of files to process simultaneously during SQL cleansing

deploymentAssistant.testMode.description: Enable test mode to skip SSH execution and simulate Copilot responses

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
